Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Dumazulu Lodge & Traditional Village in Hluhluwe, you'll be within the region of False Bay Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 21 individually decorated guestrooms. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. Additional amenities include babysitting/childcare, gift shops/newsstands, and shopping on site.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Dumazulu Lodge & Traditional Village. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary hot/cold buffet breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, multilingual staff, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Dumazulu Lodge & Traditional Village. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary hot/cold buffet breakfast is included.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

False Bay Park - 16.7 km / 10.4 mi
Greater St Lucia Wetland Park - 24.1 km / 15 mi
Hluhluwe-Imfolozi Park - 27.1 km / 16.8 mi
Phinda Resource Reserve - 27.4 km / 17 mi
St. Lucia Wetland Heritage Park and Estuary - 31.2 km / 19.4 mi
Mkhuze Game Reserve - 53.1 km / 33 mi
Enseleni Nature Reserve - 70.6 km / 43.8 mi
Sodwana Bay Beach - 73.8 km / 45.9 mi
Mkuze Falls Game Reserve - 79 km / 49.1 mi
Jozini Dam - 79.2 km / 49.2 mi
Ondini Historical Reserve - 84.4 km / 52.5 mi
Ondini Battlefield - 87.3 km / 54.2 mi
Ulundi Battlefield - 87.3 km / 54.2 mi
Lake Sibaya - 91.6 km / 56.9 mi
Mabibi - 98.2 km / 61 mi

The preferred airport for Dumazulu Lodge & Traditional Village is Durban (DUR-King Shaka Intl.) - 203.2 km / 126.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
